events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website, but I want to request a refund because the size I ordered does not fit me at all.
The customer has requested a refund due to ordering the wrong size and seeking a return.
Customer case assigned to refund specialist for handling the return and refund process.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us regarding your order. I'm here to assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been opened or worn so we can proceed?
Sure, my order number is 12345XYZ. The jacket is still brand new; I have not worn it and the tags are intact.
Thank you for the info. You can return the jacket using the prepaid shipping label we will email you shortly, and we'll issue a full refund once we receive the item.
Great, thanks for the quick response! I appreciate the prepaid label and will send it back today.
We have received your returned jacket and processed the full refund to your original payment method. Please allow 3-5 business days to reflect.
We wanted to check in and ensure that the refund has appeared on your account and that you are satisfied with the resolution.
This case is now closed. Please contact us again if you need any further assistance or have other questions.
